content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting System
Located around position (-80.0):
- Two furnaces at (45.0, -80.0) and (47.0, -80.0), both fueled with 50 coal each
- Two burner inserters at (44.5, -81.5) and (46.5, -81.5)
- Belt group system containing:
  - First belt: 21 coal
  - Second belt: 4 coal
  - Third belt: 1 iron ore and 1 coal
  - Fourth belt: empty

The system appears to be set up for iron smelting with automated fuel and material handling, though currently not actively processing (furnaces show NO_INGREDIENTS status).

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Conflicts
- Ensure target location is clear before placing inserters - multiple attempts failed due to existing objects or terrain constraints
- When placing inserters near furnaces, verify the exact positioning to avoid conflicts with existing structures
- Use proper coordinate calculations to avoid placing entities on top of each other

### Inserter Orientation Issues
- Multiple attempts were made to correct inserter orientations showing trial and error
- Establish clear orientation requirements before placement (north/south/up/down)
- Consider the entire material flow when determining inserter orientation
- Verify pickup and drop positions align with intended material flow

NAMESPACE

### Variables
- input_inserter1: Entity (burner-inserter)
- input_inserter2: Entity (burner-inserter)

### Functions
- place_entity(): Places entities on the map
  - Success: When placement coordinates are clear
  - Failure: When target location is occupied or invalid

### System States
- EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS: Furnace state when empty
- EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS: Inserter state when no items to pick up
